```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(corrplot)
emote = read_csv('EMOTE_raw.csv')


pos = emote %>%
    dplyr::filter(adjective == 1, adim1 != -99) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(adim1) %>%
    top_n(250, adim1) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(freq_TV) %>%
    top_n(150, freq_TV)


neg = emote %>%
    dplyr::filter(adjective == 1, adim9 != -99) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(adim9) %>%
    top_n(250, desc(adim9)) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(freq_TV) %>%
    top_n(150, freq_TV)


emote %>%
    dplyr::filter(adjective == 1) %>%
    dplyr::select(contains('adim')) %>%
    cor() %>%
    corrplot(addCoef.col = 'black', method = 'color')
```
